wikipedia_page.main: Paul Joseph "PJ" Crossan (born 9 October 1998) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Scottish League Two club Forfar Athletic. Crossan began his career with Dunfermline Athletic, before moving to Celtic in 2016. He also had spells with Alloa Athletic, Stranraer and Dumbarton.

response: * Rick O'Shea (born 1973), Irish radio personality, real name Paul Crossan
* Paul Crossan, real name of Irish radio personality Rick O'Shea
